message: Nakia Phillips, 39, of Farmington, Missouri, was sentenced today to 22 years in prison for sex trafficking crimes.  He appeared in federal court this morning before U.S. District Court Judge Ronnie White.

data.description: Nakia Phillips, 39, of Farmington, Missouri, was sentenced today to 22 years in prison for sex trafficking crimes. He appeared in federal court this morning before U.S. District Court Judge Ronnie White.
data.title: Farmington Man, Nakia Phillips Sentenced for Sex Trafficking and Child Pornography
